body_html: I finally got CUDA working on High Sierra, CUDA 9, and cuDNN 7, by downgrading to Xcode 8.3.3, removing the "align"s, doing the LD_LIBRARY_PATH modification, and removing "-lgomp" from the CUDA makefile. Pain in the butt, but it works!
body_text: I finally got CUDA working on High Sierra, CUDA 9, and cuDNN 7, by downgrading to Xcode 8.3.3, removing the "align"s, doing the LD_LIBRARY_PATH modification, and removing "-lgomp" from the CUDA makefile. Pain in the butt, but it works!
body: I finally got CUDA working on High Sierra, CUDA 9, and cuDNN 7, by downgrading to Xcode 8.3.3, removing the "align"s, doing the LD_LIBRARY_PATH modification, and removing "-lgomp" from the CUDA makefile. Pain in the butt, but it works!
